item.title: Using startActivityForResult Intent Launchers in Compose
item.description: Namaskaram! Problem Android provides the following intent launcher APIs: Legacy, Deprecated : startActivityForResult() & onActivityResult() New: registerForActivityResult() Both APIs are tightly coupled with Activity as they are functions of Activity. Launching such intents from composables is tricky because of 2 reasons: Passing launcher instance to Composable : registerForActivityResult() returns an instance of ActivityResultLauncher. To launch, this instance is required ( like launcher.launch(intent) ). For Composable to be able to launch, launcher needs to passed to it.
